channel.title: Monochrome Problem
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monochrome Problem" - Awesome Pants not so Awsome?

item.title: Re: Monochrome Problem
item.content:encoded:
Yes, up to just now i was indeed only Sp. Jonin. So will try again tomorrow with Monochrome.

Did not have the option to do Mono earlier than Jonin the last Seasons, that's why I didn't have this problem before, thanks for all the answers!

item.title: Re: Monochrome Problem
item.content:encoded:
Im Jonnin and ive got Miss Kitty lvl.2
Puppy of Doom is Nin no rare to get MissKitty lvled up to 2

item.title: Re: Monochrome Problem
item.content:encoded: are you running the missions in general mode (click only the mission) or specific mode (tai, nin or gen choosen)???

item.title: Re: Monochrome Problem
item.content:encoded:
I believe Uzuki confirmed that you also have to be Jonin (or Sannin) to get those missions.

If you already are, then it's probably just RNG hate.

item.title: Monochrome Problem
item.content:encoded:
I triplechecked that I do have Awsome Pants and not sold it by accident or whatever, if i do a Monomission I only lose 5 Stamina, so I definatly have the Pants, however, while doing Monomission and using up to 200 Smokes in total yesterday and today I have not seen a single mission that should become available after obtaining the Pants. I thought this might be due the low Crank I had yesterday, so i cranked up to my personal max of 7. However still no missions show up. Be that running specific Missions (to level Kitty or Strawberry) or generic ones to get the Rare missions.

Is this just a case of extreem bad luck or am I forgetting something here? Any help or hint would be appreciated.
